original: intros q p H. unfold is_lcm. destruct H as [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. - apply divides_mult. + apply Nat.divides_1_inv. apply H1. + apply Nat.divides_is_gcd with (b:=1). * apply Nat.divides_1_inv. apply H2. * apply H. - intros k H4 H5. apply Nat.mk_is_divisible. apply Nat.div_unique with (q:=1). + apply H2. + apply H3. apply H.
